name: Fast Motorcycle Racer on highway - Escape The Rider Through Traffic Rush
name_original: Fast Motorcycle Racer on highway - Escape The Rider Through Traffic Rush
description:
Start your engine and gear up to beat the enemy cars all along the Highway street race

Your aim is to reach as far as possible meanwhile avoiding the crash with other cars. Shoot the bombing hardcore bullets to blast the enemy’s boss yellow car.

All it’s upto you how you escape this big crowded traffic rush.

As you move more further, it would turn out to be quite addicting that would force you to play more and more

So are you up for this racing challenge?
